title: BookSwap
description: A community-driven platform for exchanging books and literary recommendations.
introduction: BookSwap is a platform designed to connect book lovers, enabling them to exchange books and share literary recommendations. Our goal is to create a vibrant community where readers can discover new titles, swap books, and discuss their favorite reads.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: We observed that many book lovers struggle to discover new titles and often have unused books on their shelves. BookSwap aims to solve this by creating a platform where users can exchange books and get personalized recommendations. We built the initial prototype using Flask and SQLite to keep it simple and scalable.

sections.title: MVP Development
sections.body: The Minimum Viable Product (MVP) focused on core features: user profiles, book listings, and a basic recommendation system. We used React for the frontend to ensure a smooth user experience. Initial challenges included matching users with similar interests and ensuring a seamless book-swapping process.

sections.title: Enhancing Recommendations
sections.body: To improve the recommendation system, we integrated a machine learning model using TensorFlow. The model analyzes user preferences and swap history to suggest relevant books. This phase also saw the implementation of a rating system to further refine recommendations.

sections.title: Introducing Social Features
sections.body: We added social features such as following users, creating discussions, and sharing reviews. This phase required a shift to a more robust backend using Node.js and Express. Challenges included ensuring real-time updates and managing increased user interactions.

sections.title: Expanding Beyond Books
sections.body: To broaden the platform's appeal, we introduced support for exchanging movies, music, and games. This required a database redesign using MongoDB for better flexibility. The frontend was updated with a new UI/UX design to accommodate the expanded features.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Our roadmap includes introducing gamification elements, such as badges and leaderboards, to encourage user engagement. We also plan to partner with publishers for exclusive content and integrate AI-driven book clubs for deeper community interaction.
